q: the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. "With everything going on, I wanted to play well," Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was Ben Roethlisbergerched by Pistons coach Michael Bruce Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving. He apologized Friday morning, then sat on the Ben Roethlisbergerch for almost 10 minutes as Rodney Stuckey started instead

Debbie Wasserman Schultz , D-Fla., and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y. It felt like we were watching a miracle, Debbie Wasserman Schultz told reporters traveling back to Washington with her on Air Force One. "The strength that you could see flowing out of her, it was like she was trying to will her eyes open."

People who have nothing in their mind except gold, gold, gold! Zahi Hawass says about 70 artifacts were damaged by looters who he believes were looking for a red material from the throats of mummies that Egyptian legend says can provide supernatural powers.
